title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has excessive flashing. Please investigate and resolve the issue.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted when resizing the window vertically.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window vertically only. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
